items.sentence: You promised me that you would take care of Tom.
You promised that you would be there last night.
You said you had something that belonged to Tom.
Tom thought his eyes were playing tricks on him.
Tom said he could swim at least as well as Mary.
You\'re too young to be doing that, aren\'t you?
You\'re too young to join the army, aren\'t you?
I think we should consider doing something else.
I don\'t think we\'d have any chance of winning.
I can\'t believe you\'re considering doing that.
